import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import { auth } from './firebase'; function Header() { const [{ basket, user }] = useStateValue(); console.log(basket); return (
Hello {user?.email} Sign In
Return &Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
); } export default Header;
